MainFrame - Class in org.sebastiandine.cardcollectionmanager.ui
 
MainFrame() - Constructor for class org.sebastiandine.cardcollectionmanager.ui.MainFrame
 
MenuBarObservable - Class in org.sebastiandine.cardcollectionmanager.ui.menubar
This class represents the application's menubar by managing an internal JMenuBar object and extending Observable to provide observers the possibility to react to user interaction with the menubar.
MenuBarObservable() - Constructor for class org.sebastiandine.cardcollectionmanager.ui.menubar.MenuBarObservable
 
mouseClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class org.sebastiandine.cardcollectionmanager.ui.dialogs.card.DialogMaintainCardObservable
This method coordinates mouse click events, to which this class listens to
mouseClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class org.sebastiandine.cardcollectionmanager.ui.panel.card.CardBeanInfoPanel
This method creates a DialogShowCardImage object with the front or back image of the corresponding internal CardBean object, depending on whether the icon for the back or front image has been pressed.
mouseEntered(MouseEvent) - Method in class org.sebastiandine.cardcollectionmanager.ui.dialogs.card.DialogMaintainCardObservable
This method changes the background color of the textfields, related to the front and back images, when the mouse hovers over them.
mouseEntered(MouseEvent) - Method in class org.sebastiandine.cardcollectionmanager.ui.panel.card.CardBeanInfoPanel
This method changes the color of the icon for the front or back image to light gray, when the mouse hovers into the icon.
mouseExited(MouseEvent) - Method in class org.sebastiandine.cardcollectionmanager.ui.dialogs.card.DialogMaintainCardObservable
This method changes the background color of the textfields, related to the front and back images, back to their inital color, when they were changed by method DialogMaintainCardObservable.mouseEntered(MouseEvent).
mouseExited(MouseEvent) - Method in class org.sebastiandine.cardcollectionmanager.ui.panel.card.CardBeanInfoPanel
This method changes the color of the icon for the front or back image to its normal color, when the mouse hovers out of the icon.
mousePressed(MouseEvent) - Method in class org.sebastiandine.cardcollectionmanager.ui.dialogs.card.DialogMaintainCardObservable
 
mousePressed(MouseEvent) - Method in class org.sebastiandine.cardcollectionmanager.ui.panel.card.CardBeanInfoPanel
 
mouseReleased(MouseEvent) - Method in class org.sebastiandine.cardcollectionmanager.ui.dialogs.card.DialogMaintainCardObservable
 
mouseReleased(MouseEvent) - Method in class org.sebastiandine.cardcollectionmanager.ui.panel.card.CardBeanInfoPanel
 
MtgApiClient - Class in org.sebastiandine.cardcollectionmanager.services
This class acts as a client to the official MTG API.
MtgApiClient() - Constructor for class org.sebastiandine.cardcollectionmanager.services.MtgApiClient
